alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:04AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts associated with weakening thunderstorms will impact portions of Jewell, northern Smith, southern Nuckolls, southeastern Franklin and Webster Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 600 AM CDT, several automated weather stations reported strong wind gusts associated with decaying thunderstorms from northern Harlan County to near Blue Hill in south central Nebraska. Movement was southeast. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Automated Weather Stations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Superior, Smith Center, Red Cloud, Franklin, Mankato, Nelson, Jewell, Campbell, Bladen, Guide Rock, Lebanon, Burr Oak, Hardy, Ruskin, Naponee, Bloomington, Esbon, Formoso, Riverton and Ionia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
